name: Equinox
description: Engaged in personal fitness and wellness activities, demonstrating a commitment to maintaining a balanced and healthy lifestyle. Participated in group fitness classes, endurance training, and community wellness events.

name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
description: Participated in technical seminars, conferences, and workshops on emerging technologies, with a focus on data science, machine learning, and sustainable development.

name: Youth Red Cross
description: Organized and participated in blood donation drives, health awareness campaigns, and disaster relief efforts, contributing to community welfare and public health initiatives.

name: Data Science Society
description: Engaged with the data science community through meetups, hackathons, and data-driven projects, contributing to open-source data science initiatives and collaborations.

name: Data Science for Sustainable Development
description: Utilized population density metrics and existing datasets to model the correlation between War Fire incidents and resultant window damage. Leveraged Geopandas for geospatial analysis to construct a predictive model amidst data ambiguity.

name: Institution of Electronics and Telecommunication Engineers
description: Engaged in knowledge-sharing events and conferences, staying updated on the latest trends in telecommunications and electronics engineering.
